Actors.0: Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Luke Bracey
Actors.1: Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Luke Bracey
Actors.2: Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Luke Bracey

Plot.0: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.
Plot.1: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.
Plot.2: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.
